comments:
Build ID: ies322-GM_wtp153-GM

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a J2EE project
2.Import my PI file
3.Open the deployment descriptor in src view mode, do not close it
4.Open my EJB bean file, make some changes to it and let my custom builders run
5.Click back to deployment descriptor tab

*If -consolelog is specified, the JVM crashed

More information:
The following 2 kinds of exception (there can be hundred of these) can be found in the .log file:

------------------------------------------------
